source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Intro to Abstract Painting #1 and #2
items.headline: Painting Acrylic Abstract Art; Find your Creativity with easy to follow Demos on how I create popular abstract paintings
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will have learned:
- How to paint some very popular abstract paintings that practically sell themselves
- Unusual methods for applying acrylic paints

items.title: Art for Beginners: Drawing and Watercolor Painting Animals
items.headline: Learn How to Draw & Paint with Watercolors: 11 Simple Art Lessons Designed Especially for Beginners of All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 11 magnificent watercolor paintings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: The Art & Science of Drawing / MEASURING & PROPORTION
items.headline: Dramatically increase the accuracy of your drawings.
objectives_summary: How to determine the proportions of any subject
How to use the pencil to transfer accurate information from their subject to their drawing surface.
How to combine a variety of measuring techniques to accurately measure any subject.

items.title: Art for Beginners & Kids: 8 Drawing & Mixed-Media Projects
items.headline: The Perfect Class to Learn Drawing, Painting, Watercolor, Pastel and Mixed Media Art Skills for Kids & Beginners.
objectives_summary: Learn basic drawing and crafting skills
Create 8 beautiful art projects by the end of this course
Begin a lifelong journey of loving art

items.title: Beginners Watercolor Techniques with Geoff Hutchins

visible_instructors.title: Geoff Hutchins
visible_instructors.name: Geoff
visible_instructors.job_title: English Professional Artist and Tutor Geoff Hutchins

items.headline: Learn to master the essential basics of watercolor painting
objectives_summary: You will learn many useful techniques for producing watercolor paintings of your own.
No previous experience is required.  By the end of this course you will be able to finish a watercolor painting with confidence
Learn the basics of composition, texture, perspective and detail.

items.title: Acrylic Painting - Introduction to Acrylic Painting

visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.name: Rod
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher

items.headline: An Introduction to Acrylic Painting For Beginners. Learn how to paint in Acrylics using the Moore Method of Painting
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of Acrylic Painting
Gain knowledge on the basic equipment needed for Acrylic Painting
Learn the Moore Method of Painting

items.title: The Art & Science of Drawing / CONTOURS
items.headline: Learn to create compelling contour drawings and how to draw using foreshortening!
objectives_summary: How to craft compelling contour drawings.
How to use overlaps and inner contours to create the illusion of volume in drawings.
How to draw using cross contour lines that describe the topography of a subject in great detail.

items.title: The Watercolor Workshop
items.headline: "The Watercolor Workshop" develops the confidence needed for success with watercolor painting.
objectives_summary: 18 illustrated ebooks
Choose appropriate materials for watercolor painting
Apply color theory to paintings

items.title: The Digital Painting w/ Procreate Guide | Grayscale method
items.headline: We'll complete a digital painting in this step-by-step, easy to follow course with tons of tips, tricks, & shortcuts!
objectives_summary: You'll learn that Procreate's tools are more powerful than most realize!
You'll learn tons of tips, little-known tricks, and shortcuts for this amazing iPad app.
You'll learn creative ways to use selections, layer masks, filters, adjustments, and a lot more!

items.title: How to Make Melt & Pour Soap - Beginners Step by Step Guide

visible_instructors.title: Shona O'Connor
visible_instructors.name: Shona
visible_instructors.job_title: Crafter, Maker of Soap, Hair, Bath and Body, Trainer

items.headline: Melt and pour soap making is quick, fun and easy, whether you want a new hobby, or to make gifts for friends & family.
objectives_summary: Make a range of melt and pour soaps , that will be ready in a few hours, using pre-made soap bases, colours and fragrances.
Use a variety of techniques to create stunning visual effects in the soap
Use natural and cosmetic colours to get the look you want, whether you want fun or the natural rustic feel.

items.title: The Art & Science of Figure Drawing: VOLUME & STRUCTURE
items.headline: Learn to Draw the Figure in Dramatic 3-Dimensions
objectives_summary: How to draw the figure as a 3-Dimensional object occupying deep space.
How to combine basic volumes like the sphere, cylinder and cube, to create the more complex volumes of the figure.
How to incorporate volumetric drawing into more naturalistic drawings of the figure.

items.title: Drawing Comics - Anatomy and Figure Drawing

visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk
visible_instructors.name: Ed
visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator and Instructor at How To Draw Comics . net

items.headline: A step by step guide to drawing human anatomy
objectives_summary: Understand human anatomy
Draw human anatomy in dynamic ranges
Understand muscle insertions

items.title: Drawing for Beginners: How to Draw Step-by-Step Cartoons
items.headline: Parents: Send Me a Drawing Request & I Will Create a Drawing Lesson. Let's Build This Course Together! All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 80+ awesome cartoon drawings!
Have the opportunity to participate in creating a Drawing Course for Beginners.
Take part in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.

items.title: How to Draw 101: BASIC DRAWING SKILLS & Sketching Course
items.headline: Learn to draw & sketch - drawing basics for beginners w/ exciting 3D sketching exercises to develop your drawing skills
objectives_summary: how to draw lines, curves, 2D/3D shapes
how to see with the eyes of the artist
how to sketch real life subjects

items.title: The Mechanics of Watercolor Painting

visible_instructors.title: Jill Poyerd
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist and Fine Arts Educator
visible_instructors.name: Jill

items.headline: A comprehensive approach to the fundamentals of watercolor painting.
objectives_summary: How to grip and manipulate your paint brush
How to mix varying dilutions of paint
Methods for diluting your paint

items.title: Learn Digital Color with Photoshop
items.headline: Learn coloring from a professional colorist!
objectives_summary: Set up line art for coloring
Pick colors that work well
Flat pages quickly and easily
